resources.string: Don\’t let distraction and procrastination define the way you work. Everyone has 24 hours a day, but your work life can become dramatically better with exciting results. Only one message a day. These walltips work like magic. Check out what your phone screen could look like.

Not everyone has a personal trainer, but everyone can live a healthier life. Just a little reminder can inspire you to go for a jog or get a protein filled breakfast. Only one message a day. These walltips work like magic. Check out what your phone screen could look like.

Don\’t let a bad hair day or a tough Monday stand in your way to success. A speck of positive thinking is all we might need for a better day and bigger achievements. Only one message a day. These walltips work like magic. Check out what your phone screen could look like.
This app changes wallpapers on your device based on your chosen goal that you want to achieve
Alarm Set from device boot. Is it working?
We check mobile phones more than 237 times a day on average. If we do that, why don\'t we set our phones for a better use.
Your wallpaper will change in a few seconds :)
Add a long description here about your app\'s important feature.
Even the most motivated of us — you, me, Tony Robbins — can feel unmotivated at times.
Check out these ways to be healthier and live longer
Life is easy with a positive attitude, wouldn\'t you agree? Well, easier at least
The Magic start at night. Have fun.

Your phone is a magical thing. It must be, since you’re touching it 200 times a day. Use that magic to live your life to the max. Get practical tips and advice on your phone screen to keep focused on your goals or to find a path to success. Personal or professional, one walltip a day on your phone screen can change the way you live it. The choice is in your hands. Literally.
Make the most of your day with your phone. Want to get the Walltips on a different theme? You can always change your choice.
"Have ideas on how Walltip could make your day even better? Let us know martynaskairys@gmail.com"

string-array.name: tips_inspiration
string-array.item: Sometimes the wrong choices bring us to the right places. - Unknown
You are afraid to die, and you’re afraid to live. What a way to exist – Neale Donald Walsch
He who knows nothing is closer to the truth than he whose mind is filled with falsehoods and errors. – Thomas Jefferson
Its not up to you how you fall. Its up to you how far you let yourself fall and how long it takes you to get back up and stand on your own two feet” - Sr. Tac Jeffrey Mitchell

”Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.” - Charles F. Kettering
If you can’t be criticized for it, it’s probably not remarkable. Are you devoting yourself to something devoid of criticism?
“It’s human nature to start taking things for granted again when danger isn’t banging loudly on the door.” – David Hackworth
Push through the pain, and conquer the obstacles. Regardless of what you think today, it wont matter 5 years from now. SO DON’T BE AFRAID! - Unknown
Think outside of the box, create your own path in life. “You laugh at me because I am different; I laugh because you are all the same.”~ Daniel Knode
”The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.” …so remember: great achievements take time, there is no overnight success. – Leo Tolstoy
Even the greatest was once a beginner. Don’t be afraid to take that first step. - Unknown
Do you give as much energy to your dreams as you do to your fears? - Unknown

string-array.name: tips_health
string-array.item: Bring water bottle when you go out.

string-array.name: tips_positivity
string-array.item: Call an old friend or relative
Ask for a hug from one person a day

resources.string: If your wallpaper is not showing properly please contact us or go to Google Play Store
